quagga.input.subject: Re: Goldman Sachs CFO Conference
quagga.input.body:
Sounds interesting, and Scottsdale is supposed to be nice.  Enjoy! 


   
	
	
	From:  Sheila Glover                           04/20/2000 12:07 PM
	

To: Sally Beck/HOU/ECT@ECT, Gary Hickerson/HOU/ECT@ECT
cc: Kelly Templeton/Corp/Enron@ENRON, Patti Thompson/HOU/ECT@ECT, Theresa T 
Brogan/HOU/ECT@ECT, Laurel Adams/HOU/ECT@ECT, Clara Carrington/HOU/ECT@ECT 
Subject: Goldman Sachs CFO Conference

I will be out of the office on May 9 and 10 attending a Goldman Sachs CFO 
Hedge Fund Conference in Scottsdale, AZ.

Theresa, Laurel and Clara are in.
Sheila
